useCase.name: Configure AGVs in Warehouse
useCase.description: Allow Warehouse Employee to configure Automated Guided Vehicles (AGVs) available in the warehouse.

mainSequence.step: Warehouse Employee asks to configure the AGVs available on the warehouse.
System requests data(agvDock) from Warehouse Employee.
Warehouse Employee types the requested data.
System requests additional data(shortDescription, model, maximumWeight, maximumVolume, baseLocation, status, currentTask) from Warehouse Employee.
Warehouse Employee types the requested data.
System informs the operation success to Warehouse Employee.
